name: LinkedTrees
description:
Objcetif

You are Midori, a little creature of the forest. Your objectif is to help trees to communicate, by linking them together.

Gameplay/How to play

This game is a 2d puzzle platformer. You can use a game controler or the keyboard to move from right to left and jump. For complete a level, you have to link trees by staying 3 second at the right place. Don't worry if you fall in a hole, you can't die and you can go out by spamming the jumping button and using the up button.

Features
  • Game controler and keyboard support
  • Language (English)
  • There are a few easter eggs hidden in the background for you to find
Credits
  • Code: Alison
  • Code and music : Flo
  • Graphics assets : SumiAngy
  • Levels design : GromPa
